mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_info(name, ci_path, description, rank_score, kind, use_yn, create_timestamp, modified_timestamp) VALUES(#{name}, #{ciPath}, #{description}, #{rankScore}, #{kind}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO team_user_mapping(user_id, team_id, role_code, use_yn, create_timestamp, modified_timestamp) VALUES(#{userId}, #{teamId}, #{roleCode}, 'Y', NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO play_time_info(team_id, from_time, to_time, day_of_week) VALUES(#{teamId}, #{playTimeFrom}, #{playTimeTo}, #{dayOfWeek})

INSERT INTO hometown_info(team_id, jibun_address, road_address, latitude, longitude, legal_code ,name ) VALUES(#{teamId}, #{jibunAddress}, #{roadAddress}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{legalCode} ,#{name} )
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.name, a.ci_path, a.description, a.rank_score, a.kind , b.user_id AS owner_id FROM team_info a LEFT OUTER JOIN team_user_mapping b ON a.id = b.team_id AND b.role_code = 'O' WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT b.id, b.nickname, b.description, b.ci_path FROM team_user_mapping a INNER JOIN user_info b ON a.user_id = b.id and b.use_yn = 'Y' WHERE a.team_id = #{teamId} AND a.use_yn = 'Y'
